name: Tourist Futuristic Flying Car
description:
Experience the extreme drive of Tourist Futuristic Flying Car that fly like a jet aircraft. Tourist Futuristic Flying Car is a perfect game to test your airplane pilot skills as well as sports car driving ability. An extremely futuristic muscle car that lets you fly like a plane all around the world to discover new landscapes. You are free to drift around, perform stunts and drive like the best car driver. All in one airplane flight games, simulation games and free car driving games!

Pick & Drop Tourists from one city to another hover city. You can feel the future driving this Hovercraft. Imagine a future city with flying cars unlike the classic car games with offroad driving & racing. Fly futuristic muscle car freely around skyscraper among the clouds over a beautiful city. Transform your muscle car wheels into quadcopter to fly high where there is no asphalt road, rivers, islands or mountains to reach. Experience the best Flying Car flight experience. Test your muscle to drive a super futuristic flying car. Load and unload luggage’s, pick and drop people from one place to another destination. Hit the streets, hover around to do the job.


Tourist Futuristic Flying Car Features:
√ Futuristic Flying Car
√ Stunning HD Graphics
√ Beautiful city environment with skyscraper
√ Load & unload goods
√ Pick & drop passengers
√ Realistic and dynamic car physics
√ Realistic Airplane physics
√ Easy and Free to use
√ No internet connection needed
